name: Together (For Once)
description:
A submission to the GDevelop Game Jam #2 by BookBerryTea Studio!

Note: Use the Arrow Keys to move.  Use Right Shift to advance the dialogue.

Welcome to Wisteria Grounds, a school for training magical creatures!

 I am your headmistress, and you are late!

But not to worry! There is one pet left!

Meet the obnoxious Mossy!  I'm sure you'll...get along fine, especially when, um, problems arise.

Liluo.io Link: https://liluo.io/bookberrytea/together-for-once
